coreAtributes.authorTag: On the inside of each shin pad, faint rubberised ink reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Threadworks."
coreAtributes.name: Enforcer's riot shin guards
coreAtributes.description: A set of metallic plates that protect the wearer's shins as well as the tops of their feet.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slip)] the shinguards over [npc.her] lower [npc.legs] and [npc.verb(tighten)] the straps.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slip)] the shinguards over [npc2.namePos] lower [npc.legs] and [npc.verb(tighten)] the straps.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(stuff)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.legs] through the shinguards and hastily [npc.verb(tighten)] the straps.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(loosen)] the straps on [npc.her] shinguards and [npc.verb(slip)] them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(loosen)] the straps on [npc2.namePos] shinguards and [npc.verb(slip)] them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] at the straps on [npc2.namePos] shinguards until they're loose enough and [npc.verb(toss)] them aside.
